article: In the universe,there is the earth,the moon,the sun,the stars and all the other things too far away to see.The earth is one of the sun's  _  ,and the moon is our satellite.The moon is about three hundred and eighty thousand kilometers away  _  the earth ,but it's our  nearest  neighbor in space.It  _  more than three days to get there by spaceship No man  has travelled  fathar than the moon ,but spaceship  _  people has reached other planets. Of  _  the stars ,the sun is the nearest to the earth  Millions of  other stars are even bigger and brighter than the sun.They look small only  _  they are much farther away.You  _  see them in the daytime .But if you go out at night ,you'll be able to see many of them.
